```{r cfscl, tab.cap='Estimated coefficients from longitudinal TTU models', tab.id = 'cfscl', results="asis"}
tb <- results_ls$tables_ls$ind_preds_coefs_tbl
add_to_row_ls <- list()
add_to_row_ls$pos <- list(-1, 0, nrow(tb))
add_to_row_ls$command <- c(paste0("\\toprule \n", "&\\multicolumn{5}{c}{GLMM with Gaussian distribution and log link}&\\multicolumn{5}{c}{LMM with clog-log transformation}\\\\\n"),
                      paste0("Parameter & Estimate	& SE	& 95CI & R2	& Sigma & Estimate & SE	& 95CI & R2 & Sigma \\\\\n",
                             "\\midrule \n"),
                                    paste("\\bottomrule \n"  
                                          ))
if(params$output_type_1L_chr =="Word"){
  tb$Parameter <- stringr::str_replace_all(stringr::str_replace_all(stringr::str_replace_all(tb$Parameter,'\\\\textbf',''),'\\{',''),'\\}','')
}
if(params$output_type_1L_chr == "PDF"){
  tb$Parameter <- tb$Parameter %>% purrr::map_chr(~ifelse(endsWith(.x," model"),paste0("\\textbf{",.x,"}"),.x))
}
tb %>%
  ready4show::print_table(output_type_1L_chr = params$output_type_1L_chr,
                          caption_1L_chr = knitr::opts_current$get("tab.cap"),
                          mkdn_tbl_ref_1L_chr = paste0("tab:",knitr::opts_current$get("tab.id")),
                          use_rdocx_1L_lgl = ifelse(params$output_type_1L_chr=="Word",T,F),
                          add_to_row_ls = add_to_row_ls,
                          sanitize_fn = force)

```
